name: Post-Man (itch)
description:
Avoid annoying skinbags and tidy up storage rooms: bring stray boxes into a pile
they belong. Does there anything possibly more exciting exist for a storage
robot?

Controls Action
KeyboardGamepadMovement/Select
WASD, ArrowsD-padPick/Drop/ActionEnterX Installation and running
  • Download .zip archive
  •  Extract it 
  •  Run post-man executable (Right click -> Open)
  • Enjoy! 

Requirements

  • OpenGL 2.1+
  • 64-bit (x86_64) Windows, GNU/Linux or macOS
  • x86_64 SBCL or CCL

Sources:

https://github.com/borodust/post-man
